item.title: Casio CDP-S150 Digital Piano
item.dc:creator: Jose Caceres
item.description: Affordable excellence. The Casio CDP-S150 digital piano provides authentic piano sound and feel at an unbeatable price, making it perfect for beginners and experienced players alike.
item.content:encoded:
Discover the joy of playing piano with the Casio CDP-S150 Digital Piano. Combining premium sound quality, realistic keyboard action, and modern features, this compact and lightweight instrument is perfect for beginners and experienced players alike. The CDP-S150 features 88 fully weighted keys with scaled hammer action, providing authentic touch sensitivity and response. The AiR Sound Source technology delivers rich, expressive piano tones with dynamic range and nuance, while the built-in speaker system provides clear and immersive sound. With 10 high-quality instrument tones, including grand pianos, electric pianos, and organs, the CDP-S150 offers a wide range of musical options for practice, performance, and composition. Whether you’re playing at home, in the studio, or on the go, the Casio CDP-S150 Digital Piano is the perfect companion for your musical journey.

  • 88 Keys with scaled hammer action (Scaled Hammer Action Keyboard II hammer action)
  • 64 Voices polyphonic
  • 10 Sounds
  • Layer function
  • App function (Chordana Play for Piano)
  • Transposer function
  • Metronome
  • Reverb effect
  • Chorus
  • 2 Demo songs
  • USB to Host
  • 1 Headphone jack
  • 1 Pedal jack
  • Audio input
  • Loudspeaker: 2x 8 Watt
  • Dimensions (W x D x H): 1322 x 232 x 99 mm
  • Weight: 10.5 kg
  • Colour: Black
  • Battery operation possible (6x AA, not included)
  • Incl. SP-3 pedal,music rest and AD-A12150LW mains adapter
  • Colour: Black
  • Suitable stand CS-46P: Art. 457011 (not included in delivery)
  • Matching bag SC-800P: Art. 457013 (not included in delivery)
